mapper.insert: insert into shopInfo(shopNum, memberId, shopName, shopPhone, shopAddr, shopOpen, shopClose,shopOff, shopPhoto, shopIntro, shopParking, shopPolicy) values (shopInfo_seq.nextval,#{memberId},#{shopName},#{shopPhone},#{shopAddr},#{shopOpen},#{shopClose},#{shopOff},#{shopPhoto},#{shopIntro},#{shopParking},#{shopPolicy})
mapper.select: select shopNum, memberId, shopName, shopPhone, shopAddr, shopOpen, shopClose, shopOff, shopPhoto, shopIntro, shopParking, shopPolicy from shopInfo where shopNum=#{shopNum}

select shopInfo.shopName, shopInfo.shopIntro, shopDesign.shopNum, shopDesign.designId, shopDesign.designName, shopDesign.designTime, shopDesign.designPrice, shopDesign.designPhoto from shopDesign inner join shopInfo on shopDesign.shopNum = shopInfo.shopNum where shopDesign.shopNum = #{shopNum} order by shopDesign.designId desc

choose.when: select designName, designTime, designPrice from shopDesign where shopNum = #{shopNum} and designOption like 'NO'||'%'
select designName, designTime, designPrice from shopDesign where shopNum = #{shopNum} and designOption like 'PO'||'%'
choose.otherwise: select designName, designTime, designPrice from shopDesign where shopNum = #{shopNum} and designOption like 'LO'||'%'
